Label: Select Network Interface
Notes: select the network interface available

Label: Current IPv4
Notes: not editable

Label: UDP Port
Hover help text in the status bar: UDP Recieve Port of the Processor.

Label: TCP Port
Hover help text in the status bar: TCP Recieve Port of the Processor.

Label: Open Log Window
Notes: open Network Logging window

Label: Add Target/Server
Notes: At the end of the empty row after all targets (max 6 targets) Add a row for a new target.

Label: Target/Server Name
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)

Label: Target/Server Data Mode
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Select UDP or TCP data transmission (OSC is UDP by default).

Label: Target/Server IPv4
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: IP Address of the Target (use 127.0.0.1 for local host).

Label: Target/Server Port
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)

Label: Target/Server Rx Enable
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)

Label: Target/Server Tx Enable
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)

Label: Target/Server Protocol
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the Protocol for this Target (OSC; REMOTE for the Remote Control application; ADM-OSC)

Label: Remove Target/Server
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers). At the end of the row in the same column as the “Add target/server” of the last row. With confirmation

Label: Find My Remote
Notes: Send OSC /findDevice with findDevicePassword
Hover help text in the status bar: Make your Remote Flash and Buzz to Find it.

Label: ADM-OSC Offset X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Offset Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Offset Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Scale X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Scale Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Scale Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present

Label: ADM-OSC Flip X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking X Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Flip Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Flip Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: Tracking Enabled
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Incoming Tracking data processing.

Label: Tracking Protocol
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the type of Tracking Protocol.

Label: Tracking Rx Port
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Specify the Port to receive Tracking data.

Label: Tracking Offset X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Offset Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Offset Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Scale X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Scale Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Scale Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0

Label: Tracking Flip X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking X Coordinate

Label: Tracking Flip Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: Tracking Flip Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Z Coordinate
